: : Rodimus Prime : : 
Rodimus Prime: I think that Elita will sleep now that she is full. But we really dont have a crib or anything set up for her. 
 Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote: 
Nightlight:

"Just, curiousity"she said while she kissed him and sat down around


>From: Richard Allen >Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com >To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com >Subject: Re: Rodimus, Nightlight and Baby/Flicker and Condor >Date: Tue, 4 Mar 2003 16:23:36 -0800 (PST) > > >: : Rodimus Prime : : >Rodimus took the blanket and covered Elita. >Rodimus Prime: No, I'm verry happy with our little girl. What made you ask that? > Airshadow Nightstar wrote: >Nightlight;/Elita: > > > >Nightlight moved quickly and brought a little blanket, she sat down and give it to Rodimus in order he could cover their baby. She looked him full of love of them. > >"Would you rather that our baby was a boy?"said softly > > > > > > > > > > > >From: Richard Allen >Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com >To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com >Subject: Re: Rodimus, Nightlight and Baby/Flicker and Condor >Date: Mon, 3 Mar 2003 21:10:18 -0800 (PST) > > >: : Rodimus Prime : : >Rodimus Prime: After a infant drinks like she did, you have to burp them. This prevents any stomcach aches or anything like that. I saw Carly and Spike, two of the Autobots human allies on Earth, do this to their son Daniel when he was young. >Rodimus liked the memories that were coming to him. It was nice when he had been stationed at Autobot City by Kup, in the mid 1990's. He, or rather Hot Rod, loved giveing Kup a hardtime back then. He idolized Optimus. And he found friends in Spike, Carly, Daniel, Chip and Sparkplug. He had also met Arcee then... >Rodimus forced himself from any thoughts of Arcee for two reasons. One: he didn't want to become angry again thinking of how she became a Predacon and was killed escaping the very base he was in. Two: he had a family now. Arcee and anything that was between them was in the past, the far past. >To reassure himself, Rodimus gazed at his daughter, then too Nightlight. How lovely she was and how lucky he was to have met her. How grate it was to, despite being a millitary commander, finally have a family. > "airly2000 " wrote:Elita/Nightlight: > >"Why're you doing that ROdimus?"said couriously 'cause she never >have seen somoeone started to Burp a baby. > >The baby burped and yawed, she nuzzled against her dad, and started >to fell sleep. > > >--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen >wrote: > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : > > Rodimus takes the bottle away, and starts to "burp" the baby. He >had seen these kind of actions done by humans when the Autobots were >on Earth. > > Rodimus Prime: Well thats what it was. She was just hungry. > > "airly2000 " wrote: >Elita/nightlight: > > > > Nightlight moved and she stayed around Rodimus, Elita was sobbing > > and whinning, she was hungry. Her sobs lowed when he smelled that > > something was close... It was food!!. soon she was sucking the > > liquid, with her little paws she massaged the bottle's side with >her > > little paws in a ttempt to get more while a drop of energon >slipped > > and rolled down her cheek. > > > > Her first sips were quick, but after a while they were slow and > > stopped to drink. Her eyes looked sleepy and... started to >hiccup... > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen > > wrote: > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : > > > He smiled and took Elita into his arms. > > > Rodimus Prime: Well she is a Transformer, so I'm going to say > > Energon. I'll go feed her. > > > Roddy walked with his daughter too the kitchen area, and got a > > small bottle of liquid Energon, from the dispencer. He lets Elita > > drink as she pleased. > > > "airly2000 " > > wrote:Nightlight/Elita: > > > > > > "I think so..."said Nightlight "Do you know what a baby eats? >I... > > I > > > really don't know..." > > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen > > > wrote: > > > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : > > > > Rodimus heard Elita start to cry from the bedroom. He looked > > back > > > to Flicker. > > > > Rodimus Prime: Please excuse me. If you could see yourself >out, > > I > > > need to check on Elita. > > > > Rodimus went into the bedroom and saw Nightlight trying to >calm > > > Elita. > > > > Rodimus Prime: Is she hungry? > > > > "airly2000 " > > > wrote:Nightlight/Elita: > > > > > > > > Elita suddenly woke up and whined, Nightlight uneasy started >to > > > > check her . "What's wrong, little one?"said softly > > Nightlight "Why > > > > are you whinning?" > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 >" > > > > wrote: > > > > > Flicker:: > > > > > > > > > > "Thanks." Flicker stands up. "Well, I guess I should go > > check > > > on > > > > > Condor." > > > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen > > > > > > wrote: > > > > > > > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: Of course. I'm honored to have each and >every > > > > member > > > > > here as my crew. You included. > > > > > > "cardhead649 " > > > > wrote:Flicker:: > > > > > > > > > > > > "Really?" He does his best to sound hopeful. > > > > > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen > > > > > > > > wrote: > > > > > > > > > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: Listen, Flicker. Everyone here is useful > > and > > > > > needed. > > > > > > You are a valuble member of this crew. > > > > > > > "cardhead649 " > > > > > wrote:Flicker:: > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Flicker comes inside and sits down next to Rodimus. "I > > > feel, > > > > > well, > > > > > > > sort of useless. I mean, I'm a technician and all, but > > > you've > > > > > > > already got Wheeljack to do that stuff. And from what > > I've > > > > seen, > > > > > > he > > > > > > > does it better." He's playing the crowd, so to speak - > > like > > > a > > > > > true > > > > > > > Predacon, Flicker would never really admit that someone > > else > > > > was > > > > > > > better at something than him. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen > > > > > > > > > > wrote: > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : > > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: Sure, come in. > > > > > > > > Roddy sits on the couch. > > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: So what did you need to talk about? > > > > > > > > "cardhead649 " > > > > > > wrote:Flicker:: > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > "Uh, he's ... not doing too great." Flicker says > > > > glumly. "He's > > > > > > in > > > > > > > > the CR right now. I can't figure out what's wrong >with > > > him." > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Flicker makes a quick check up and down the hall to >make > > > > sure > > > > > > > there's > > > > > > > > nobody else around. "There's ... something else I'd > > like > > > to > > > > > talk > > > > > > > > about .... Can I come in? I'd rather not go > > broadcasting > > > > this > > > > > if > > > > > > I > > > > > > > > don't have to." > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 > > > " > > > > > > > > wrote: > > > > > > > > > Nightlight/Elita: > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Elita started to fell sleep, Nightlight watched her > > but > > > > she > > > > > > > > couldn't > > > > > > > > > fell sleep > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen > > > > > > > > > > > > > > wrote: > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : > > > > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: No, you rest. I'll get it. > > > > > > > > > > Rodimus gets up and moves to the door. He opens it > > to > > > > see > > > > > > > Flicker. > > > > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: Hey, Flicker. What's up? Hows >Condor? > > > > > > > > > > "airly2000 " > > > > > > > > > wrote:Condro/Nightlight/Elita: > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > "Somone is knoking, Rodimus"said softly "do yu >like > > > that > > > > I > > > > > > see > > > > > > > > > who's > > > > > > > > > > it?" > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 > > > > > > " > > > > > > > > > > wrote: > > > > > > > > > > > Flicker:: > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Meanwhile, the spy-bot watches Conder in the >CR. > > > He'd > > > > be > > > > > > > > coming > > > > > > > > > > out > > > > > > > > > > > soon, which worries Flicker. He needed to get >his > > > > target > > > > > > > > > > quickly. > > > > > > > > > > > Palming the neural disruptor again, he heads to > > > > Rodimus > > > > > and > > > > > > > > > > > Nightlight's quarters and knocks on the door. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 > > > > > " > > > > > > > > > > > wrote: > > > > > > > > > > > > ngihtlight : > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Nightlight smiled and looked at her baby, it >was > > a > > > > > beauty > > > > > > > > > baby, > > > > > > > > > > her > > > > > > > > > > > > beast forms eyes are golden, and her fur had >the > > > > color > > > > > of > > > > > > > > > > lioness's > > > > > > > > > > > > fur, her sablethoot's fangs weren't all > > develovep > > > > but > > > > > > they > > > > > > > > > > started > > > > > > > > > > > > to show. Her little nose was pink and he had a > > > shot > > > > > tail. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > "No"replied Nightlight with a smile"I would > > rather > > > > > > > > > > Elita..."isn't > > > > > > > > > > > > it, Elita?" > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Tha baby gigling when she heard the name >nuzzled > > > > > against > > > > > > > her > > > > > > > > > > mommy. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > wrote: > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : : > > > > > > > > > > > > > Rodimus looked at his daughter, smileing, > > before > > > > > > looking > > > > > > > > > back > > > > > > > > > > at > > > > > > > > > > > > Nightlight to answer her. > > > > > > > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: Only if you like it too.
